content: Our plans for 2023 continued to focus on our transformation, with the expansion of our remote care offering, strategic investments in optometric recruiting and retention initiatives, our omnichannel capabilities, the further digitization of our stores and corporate office, as well as continued store openings, based on the significant whitespace opportunities still ahead. We expect improved operating cash flows in 2023 and capital expenditures to be in a range of $115 million to $120 million to reflect our continued investment in key growth initiatives, including new store openings, as well as acceleration in technology investments, including remote care and electronic health records. For our 2023 fiscal year, as set forth in greater detail in our earnings release, we currently expect net revenue between $2.075 billion and $2.135 billion, supported by adjusted comparable store sales growth of 0% to 3%, our expectation is to open between 65 and 70 new stores this year.
